title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is 'MySomeClass'.
OB: When the 'onStartup' method of the 'ModuleInitializer' class is executed, the output displayed is 'MySomeAnn'.
